column1: Art Institute of Chicago////An incredible museum. The only downside is that I almost didn't have enough time to get through all the galleries. Set aside an entire afternoon
column3: and do your best to plot out a path through this vast museum. Or if you have less time
column4: the map does give you a "greatest hits" tour of 12 key works of arts housed here. Still
column5: I highly recommend carving out as much time as you can to go through the whole museum
column6: because there is far more than 12 works of art to experience and enjoy here.
